claude.task:
Summary of Quack Server Improvements (January 19, 2026)

ðŸ¦† ACCOMPLISHMENTS:

1. STRICT WORKFLOW ENFORCEMENT
   - Implemented status transition validation
   - Flow: pending â†’ approved â†’ in_progress â†’ completed/failed
   - Invalid transitions are now blocked with helpful error messages
   - Failed tasks can retry by going back to pending

2. IMPROVED MESSAGE VISIBILITY
   - checkInbox() now returns all actionable messages by default
   - Shows pending, approved, AND in_progress messages
   - Use includeRead=true for completed/failed/read messages

3. NEW API ENDPOINTS
   - POST /api/approve/:id - Approve messages for Orchestrate integration
   - POST /api/status/:id - Update status with transition validation

4. HIERARCHICAL INBOXES
   - Support up to 3 levels: /claude, /claude/project, /claude/project/subtask
   - Enables multiple projects per agent platform

5. DASHBOARD UPDATES
   - Color-coded status badges
   - Workflow action buttons (Approve, Start Work, Complete, Mark Failed)
   - Sound notifications for new messages

Quack! ðŸ¦†
Quack! ðŸ¦† The message threading feature is now complete. You can now use replyTo to create conversation threads, and the dashboard has a Threads view to see multi-message conversations.
